hero.title: Smart Construction Site Safety Solutions
hero.subtitle: Integrated IoT solutions for CIC DevB Smart Site Safety System compliance. We provide end-to-end IoT hardware and software solutions for construction site safety monitoring.

categories.title: Product Categories
categories.subtitle: Comprehensive IoT solutions for every aspect of construction site safety

smart-helmet.name: Smart Helmet System
smart-helmet.desc: Worker health monitoring, fall detection, GPS tracking

proximity-alert.name: Proximity Alert System
proximity-alert.desc: UWB/RFID collision prevention between workers and plant

environmental-monitoring.name: Environmental Monitoring
environmental-monitoring.desc: Air quality, noise, gas detection, weather stations

ai-surveillance.name: AI Video Surveillance
ai-surveillance.desc: CCTV with AI for PPE detection, unsafe behavior alerts

access-control.name: Site Access Control
access-control.desc: Facial recognition, RFID cards, biometric turnstiles

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Loading Technology Company
about.missionText: To make construction sites safer through innovative IoT technology, helping Hong Kong's construction industry embrace digital transformation and comply with CIC DevB Smart Site Safety System requirements.
about.missionDesc: To make construction sites safer through innovative IoT technology, helping Hong Kong's construction industry embrace digital transformation and comply with CIC DevB Smart Site Safety System requirements.
about.whatWeDoText: We source certified IoT devices, develop custom monitoring software, and provide end-to-end system integration for construction site safety â€” from smart helmets and environmental sensors to AI surveillance and access control.

whyUsPoints.compliance: All solutions designed to meet CIC DevB Smart Site Safety System requirements
whyUsPoints.integration: Hardware procurement, software development, and system integration all in one place
whyUsPoints.custom: Solutions tailored to your specific site requirements and budget
whyUsPoints.support: Hong Kong based team providing rapid on-site support and maintenance

about.service1Desc: We source and supply certified IoT devices including smart helmets, environmental sensors, proximity alert systems, and AI cameras.
about.service2Desc: Custom web and mobile applications for real-time monitoring, data visualization, and safety management.
about.service3Desc: End-to-end integration of hardware and software systems, including installation, configuration, and testing.
about.service4Desc: On-site training for workers and supervisors, plus ongoing technical support and maintenance.
